task_description:
# Bulk User Export

Allow administrators to export search results and user data to CSV/Excel format for reporting, compliance documentation, and integration with external systems.

## Rationale
Compliance audits and HR reporting often require user data exports. Currently this requires manual copying. Enterprise competitors have 'weak customization' and 'limited reporting' (pain-gen-5, pain-sp-6) - easy export fills a common gap. Self-hosted WhoDis can provide data without vendor dependencies.

## User Stories
- As an IT security analyst, I want to export user data to CSV so that I can analyze it in Excel for compliance reports
- As an HR administrator, I want to export employee access data so that I can document quarterly access reviews

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Export button available on search results page for Admin/Editor roles
- [ ] Export includes all displayed fields (AD, Graph, Genesys data)
- [ ] CSV format with proper escaping and UTF-8 encoding
- [ ] Excel (.xlsx) format option available
- [ ] Export includes timestamp and search criteria metadata
- [ ] Audit log entry created for each export operation
